title: Titanium Watch Face
summary: Analog and digital watch face with weather, missed calls, unread messages etc.
description: On this watch face you can select color for watch display, turn on/off animation, set time format etc.Here is also missed calls and unread messages indicators, date and month. Weather is allso available with 3 providers. Watch and phone battery indivators are allso available and animated.You can screen time and sweep or smooth seconds.If you have some problems please contact us.
descriptionHTML:
On this watch face you can select color for watch display, turn on/off animation, set time format etc.

Here is also missed calls and unread messages indicators, date and month.
Weather is allso available with 3 providers.
Watch and phone battery indivators are allso available and animated.

You can screen time and sweep or smooth seconds.

If you have some problems please contact us.
comments: Titanium rich watch face I have a motorola 360, and this watch face is very attractive, but it does not work .  The two rectangles at bottom are always empty. I have many of the other Rich watch faces and they work just fine.

Its good but... The watch face is very attractive no doubt, but give some more functionality like time zone option for LCD panel, its very helpful for a guy like me who travels a lot. Hoping to see it in next update.
Marcin Doesn't work on Motorola moto 360 2nd. Wasting time and money.
Come on... , why you not update it to support android wear 2? I have waiting to long time
Great Watch Face.  Using it for a while now. Please add a "square" ambient mode,  then it would be perfect.
Good If this watch face had square ambient mode I would love it.
